alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Columbia and east central Sauk Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 805 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prairie Du Sac, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Lake Wisconsin, Lodi, Poynette, Fall River, Arlington, Bluffview, Otsego, Merrimac, Doylestown, Harmony Grove, and Okee. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 114 and 122. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 113 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
